name: Wispy Business
description:
As Wisper the wisp you must survive as long as you can against the hordes of stone soldiers coming to snuff your flame out.
As a wisp you are vulnerable, but after gaining some momentum you will be able to take the fight to some of the constructs.
Made as part of a Gamejam using assets from:
Mixamo- https://www.mixamo.com/
Unreal Weapons Pack- https://launcher-website-prod07.ol.epicgames.com/ue/marketplace/en-US/product/e4...
Unreal Dark Forest- https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/dark-forest

Controls:
Left Click/Hold- Launch yourself, being able to possess enemies shortly after doing so. Use to attack when possessing.
Mouse- Move camera, wisp moves with camera direction.
WASD- Movement when possessing soldier.
